com.paco.java.subway

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paco.java.subway.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Intersection, LeafNode

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    class Node : This class is the main element / pivot of the application. The Node represents both a virtual class and a real class. A Node contains 2 links which connects to other Nodes
    Author:
    Pascal

      • Node

        public Node(java.lang.String sNodeName)
        This constructor just sets the Name of the node. If this constructor is called for the first time then we also set the IOrigin as an IOriginNode type...
        Parameters:
        sNodeName - A non empty String representing the name of the Node

    • Method Detail

      • FindNode

        public static Node FindNode(Node oNode)
        This function will try to find oNode amongst the chained list of Node and NodeLinks. If oNode is found then the instance of the chained list will be returned. Otherwise null shall be returned. This function is polymorphic and recursive for each instance of the polymorph making it very complex
        Parameters:
        oNode - : a non null of type INode that is the object being searched. This value shouldn't change during the entire process for a given call...
        oCurrentNode - : a non null of type INode that represents where we are in the chain
        Returns:
        : A possibly null value of type INode. Represents if the Node being searched does exists in the chain...

      • getNodeName

        public java.lang.String getNodeName()
        Property NodeName : Represents the name of the Node
        Returns:

      • AddNextLink

        public Node AddNextLink(NodeLink oLink)
        This function integrate a link within a Node but will also redefin the Node if need be If the Node has more than 2 Links, it automatically becomes an Intersection Node. If the NOde only has 1 Link it becomes a Leaf Node (Exception is the first IOriginNode)
        Parameters:
        oLink - : The Link that needs to be added to the Node
        Returns:
        : The Node either as a normal NOde or as an INtersection

      • getNextLink

        public NodeLink getNextLink()
        NextLink property : Represents the active Link of this Node
        Returns:

      • setActiveLink

        public void setActiveLink(NodeLink oLink)
        property ActiveLink : Represent the link that is being used in this Node. This property will be used by the NextLink function in order not to use the same link over and over...

      • getActiveLink

        public NodeLink getActiveLink()

      • ComputeNodeDistance

        public INodeLinker ComputeNodeDistance(INodeLinker oLinker,
                              Node oDestination)
        This method will follow a trail of Nodes until we either ends up on a Crossroad or find the oDestination node.
        Parameters:
        oLinker - : a non null NodeLinker object
        oDestination - : a non null Node object representing the Node that is being searched
        Returns:
        : a NodeLinker object linking the start Node with the current Node
